_comment: EZLogger Local User Configuration File - last updated 2024-12-19

this_config._comment: Identifies this as a user-specific config file
this_config.name: user config

sp_filepath._comment: Local file paths used by the user for templates, contact databases, and shared config references
sp_filepath.databases: Forensic Services Office - Forensics Wizard - EzLogger_Databases
sp_filepath.user_forensic_database: Forensic Services Office - Forensics Wizard - EzLogger_Databases
sp_filepath.user_forensic_library: Forensic Services Office - Forensics Wizard - Forensic Reports Library
sp_filepath.hlv_due: Forensic Services Office - Forensics Wizard - EzLogger_Databases\HLV Due for Visit.txt
sp_filepath.ods_filepath: Forensic Services Office - Forensics Wizard - EzLogger_Databases\ODS.xlsm
sp_filepath.sheriff_addresses: Forensic Services Office - Forensics Wizard - EzLogger_Databases\Sheriff_Addresses.xlsx
sp_filepath.templates: should be in the user copy of the EZLogger SharePoint site under EZLogger_Databases\Templates

edo_filepath._comment: Shortcuts to shared drive paths, relative to a network root
